channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.14)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.0-beta.14)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # このプロジェクトの重要な変更点は以下のとおりです。 Keep a Changelogをベースにした形式で表記されています。 1.5.0-beta.14 - 2023-09-14 # Added # Avoid Name Conflict in MergeBone #467 Fixed # Light disappears #466 Automatic MergeBone may break Animation by conflictng GameObject name #467 1.5.0-beta.13 - 2023-09-13 # Added # Feature for debugging GC Objects #464 Fixed # Collider disappears #463 Behaviour can disappears if initially disabled #465 1.5.0-beta.12 - 2023-09-13 # Fixed # Transform animation broken #461 1.5.0-beta.11 - 2023-09-13 # Fixed # Tangent is broken with MergeBone #457 VRCStation disappears #460 1.
